record.name: Basic PC Package
record.description: Contains the basic essentials for a new low level or temporary employee.
record.detailedDescription:
PC Installation
Network Connectivity
17" Monitor Professional Series
Keyboard & Mouse
Standard Desktop; PIII500;128;20
